report.title: My Sites
report.description: A list of all location where my sites are returned first.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l JOIN locations_websites lw ON lw.location_id=l.id AND lw.deleted=false LEFT JOIN (person_attribute_values pav JOIN person_attributes pa ON pa.id=pav.person_attribute_id AND pa.id=#my_sites_person_attr_id# AND pav.person_id = #user_id# JOIN people p ON p.id = pav.person_id JOIN users u ON u.person_id = p.id AND u.id = #user_id# ) ON pav.int_value=l.id WHERE l.deleted=false AND #website_filter# AND (u.id = #user_id# OR u.id IS NULL) AND (l.location_type_id=#location_type_id# OR #location_type_id#='-1') ORDER BY u.id IS NULL ASC, l.name ASC

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: The warehouse ID for the location type you want to limit the report to.
